briefTitle: Study of the Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of Serlopitant for the Treatment of Pruritus (Itch) With Prurigo Nodularis
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study of the Efficacy, Safety, and Tolerability of Serlopitant for the Treatment of Pruritus in Adults With Prurigo Nodularis
summary: Study of the efficacy, safety, and tolerability of serlopitant for the treatment of pruritus in adults with prurigo nodularis

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent of Participants With Worst Itch Numeric Rating Scale (WI-NRS) 4-point Responder Rate at Week 10
